channel.description: Recent content in ufo on My Dad's Blog

item.title: Rant on Ufos
item.description: Let’s do a little math. A planet 10,000 light years away (really close by astronomical scales) decides to send a ship at 99% the speed of light to intercept earth. By the way, no transmission FROM earth was emitted 10,000 years in our past, so it would be curious as to why earth would be interesting, but I digress. Somehow the planet has some ability to accelerate a ship at 99% the speed of light.
